projects.name: Password Generator
projects.description: A simple tool that generates random and secure passwords to enhance online security.

projects.name: Accoridan
projects.description: A user-friendly component that organizes content into collapsible sections, allowing users to expand or collapse sections of information, improving readability and navigation on web pages.

projects.name: Temperature Converter
projects.description: A practical utility that effortlessly converts temperatures between Celsius, and Fahrenheit making it easy to switch between different temperature scales for various applications.

projects.name: Dad Jokes
projects.description: A collection of hilarious and corny jokes to entertain and provoke laughter, perfect for sharing with your family and friends.

projects.name: Color Picker
projects.description: A convenient tool for selecting and copying precise colors by providing accurate color choices in web design and graphics.

projects.name: Hidden Search Widget
projects.description: An interactive search widget that remains hidden until triggered, providing a sleek and modern way to access search functionality on a website or application.

projects.name: Stop Watch
projects.description: A digital stopwatch that accurately measures and displays elapsed time with start, stop, and reset functionality.

projects.name: Number Guessing Game
projects.description: A fun and interactive game where players attempt to guess a randomly generated number within a specified range, testing their intuition and numerical skills.

projects.name: Expanding Cards
projects.description: Engaging and interactive cards that expand when clicked, revealing additional content creating an engaging user experience for showcasing information or images.

projects.name: Counter
projects.description: A minimalistic counter that increments or decrements a numerical value with basic controls, providing a straightforward way to track and display counts or quantities.
